allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Use dynamic import for DashboardMap to prevent Leaflet initialization during build

Leaflet accesses browser APIs when imported, which causes errors during server-side
builds. Using dynamic import with ssr: false ensures Leaflet only loads in the browser.

This fixes the ''window is not defined'' error during the pre-render phase.

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
